channel.title: Help with prayer drain
channel.description:
I am using the Xelovution source and I noticed prayer drains really fast (goes from 99 to 0 in a few seconds). I searched client.java but couldn't find anywhere that I could change it at. If anybody knows what I need to change to make prayer drain slower please help me out.
Thanks in advanced.
Edit: Nevermind, perfect ring was making my prayer drain fast. Mod please lock topic.
